ModMetaData.name: RimCalendar
ModMetaData.author: yaboie88
ModMetaData.description:
RimCalendar adds a beautiful, immersive seasonal calendar to your RimWorld UI.
-Track quests visually before they expire -See exactly how many in-game minutes remain -Celebrate colonist birthdays -Remember fallen colonists with death anniversaries -Spot incoming raids and refugee departures -Detect shuttle arrivals and timed events
Plan ahead like never before — no more surprise raids or missed quests.
(Work in progress – more features coming soon!)
